short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension for automating data access requests

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The DARA Assistant is a modified version of the automa extension and can help users with requesting and downloading personal data stored on them by companies on the web. It can execute the clicks necessary to issue a data request on the corresponding data request page. The Assistant is a non-profit, hobbyist project - all code is open source.
